LO BUENO

+Los detalles de los escenarios

Una joya, juego mas espectacular; la historia te obliga a rejugarla sin necesidad de aburrite ni volverse tediosa, los DLC de historia son hermoso y te dan de 1 a 2 horas mas de juego.
Simplemente magnifico.
so digo isso...    melhor bioshock de todos

Es un juego demasiado frenético y de acción rápida con un arte y diseño de ambientes, música y personajes que lo hace una joya dentro del mundo de BioShock, por otro lado, tiene una narrativa que logras entenderla a pesar de lo rápido que se puede hacer a veces.

10/10
не шедевр но проходить игру вполне интересно
A great end to a beautiful series of games. I love this universe, not as much as bioshock 1 I will admit, but nonetheless thank you developers for making these games; I finally get the hype.

Je sais que cet opus ne fait pas l'unanimité, mais personnellement..wow. J'ai surkiffé cet opus ! tout comme le premier opus j'y retourne environ tous les 2 mois tellement cet univers me manque parfois. Par ce que oui l'univers est vraiment le point fort de ce jeu. La cité columbia est consistante et magnifique, vraiment. Les personnages sont vraiment attachants et l'histoire...très perturbante mais c'est ce qui fait le grain de cet opus selon moi. Le gameplay des plasmides ici remplacé par les toniques est parfait. On peut s'amuser à faire des combinaisons de pouvoir pour aborder les niveaux differement.
Je vous conseil énormement de jouer aux dlc offerts "le tombeau sous marin" qui nous replonge à rapture (juste magnifique graphiquement) et qu nous eclaire sur l'histoire de la trilogie. Bref foncez 8/10 pour moi (oui y'a un point faible quand même, c'est le gameplay avec les aerotrams qui est a chié)

just a well made game

however there is a horrible bug on linux where the textures don't load in properly that can make this gorgeous looking game really ugly sometimes.
apparently there is a way you can fix this by reinstalling the game which I didn't care to do. So do look it up before you install the game.

Comment:The game itself is a masterpiece. I've seen people not liking the changes of the gameplay but i enjoyed it's gameplay the most!
The story, the characters & the music are fantastic! I had low expectations from this game but here i am, liking Infinite the most! And also i'm very satisfied that they gave the protagonist a proper identity!

DLC: The best DLC i've ever experienced in my life! you'll be amazed that how the DLC manages to tie things together!

Looking forward to Bioshock 4! Until then, farewell to one of the best trilogies i've ever played!

сразу скажу игра крутая но 1к она не стоит очень много сюжетных поворотов от которых у меня голова кругом шла типо как это вобще можно придумать оружия много персонажи затягивают а с каждой секундой хочется играть все больше игра короткая но это не мешает ей быть почти лучшей игрой в моем списке графика на любителя но мне понравилась проходил на джостике вполне удобно хоть это и шутер  я не очень люблю всякие отхождения от игр но все же этот биошок был крутым хотя эти серии игр и связанны все равно для меня биошок инфинити осталась лучшей частью он интересная и в отличеи от других частей в нее можно играть по большому количеству времени наверно потому что действия происходят на улице и кажется что мир более менее открытый а в стареньких частях почти все происходит в помещении и мозг начинает чувствоввать запертость игра на 7из10
really good game i think it was a lot of fun and i played non stop till i finished 10/10
all of Bioshock are amazing

намальна так
what the fuck
Le jeu est insane. Tout simplement un classique.

Cara, eu n sei oq falar, eu literalmente acabei de zerar e estou sem palavras. QUE JOGO ESPETACULAR!!
De novo Bioshock se mostrando ser uma das melhores franquias de todos os tempos, tanto 1 quanto esse(nao joguei o 2 ainda mas dizem que não foi feito pelo criador original) são OBRAS PRIMAS. 
A história desse jogo é incrivel, assim como o do primeiro, te deixa boquiaberto e, os personagens... PQP fabulosos. Com destaque para a npc que fica com a gnt, AMO. É a melhor npc que acompanha vc durante a campanha, n atrapalha e é mega carismatica, nenhum chega perto dela. 
E os graficos? PERFEITOS, é impressionante que hj em dia é um dos melhores graficos que já vi, n decaiu em NADA. Ambientação? É UMA FUCKING ILHA NO CÉU, preciso dizer algo mais? 
1000/10. 
Há muito tempo n fico tão deslumbrado com um jogo. Isso pq eu tenho problemas de enjoo com a camera, mas msm assim o jogo me prendeu. 
Muito obrigado aos criadores por fazerem essa obra de arte!
COMPREM, na vdd COMPREM TODA A FRANQUIA BIOSHOCK. Mts vezes a versão collection que vem com tudo está em promoção superbarato, eu msm paguei R$30,00 em todos os jogos da franquia + DLC's. Vai e seja feliz.

Voltando dps de ter jogado todas as DLC's e posso dizer, MELHORA AINDA MAIS PQP!
É um complemento não só pra esse jogo, como tbm para o 1. É ESPETACULAR, principalmente o episodio 2 da DLC. Um dos melhores jogos ja criados SEM DUVIDA. Vale cada centavo. OBRA PRIMA!

Uzun zaman sonra bir oyun serisinin dünyasına bu kadar kendimi kaptırıp bu denli heyecanla bir oyunda ilerlemek istememiştim. Gerçekten inanılmaz bir deneyimdi. Burial at Sea DLC'lerini de oynamanızı kesinlikle tavsiye ederim. En son Half Life oynarken bu kadar zevkle bir FPS oynadığımı hatırlıyorum. Tüm seri başlı başına şaheser niteliğinde.

Игра просто супер ! Те эмоции и ощущения которые она преподносит нельзя сравнить ни с чем ! Так же стоит уделить особое внимание персонажу по имени "Элизабет" на протяжении всей игры она сопровождает нашего персонажа и тем самым даёт очень важную помощь в тяжёлой ситуации во время боя. Такого полезного искусственного интеллекта я не видел ни в одной игре. Вообще рекомендую к покупке, эмоции и ощущения которые дарит эта игра не сравнимы ни с чем.

A lot of people will say that this is the worst one. I cannot be the judge of that but all I'll say is that this is an incredible game with a great story and gameplay. The interplay betwee weapons and abilities at the same time at this level (not comparing to other bioshock games) I believe is second to very few if not none. I wish that we get more weapon mechanics and abilities like this updated to a more modern era of gaming. How cool would it be to have abilities at this level but have gunplay like the doom remakes. If only irrational didnt get shutdown

Wasnt as good as first 2 games

第一次玩这款游戏玩到结局都没有玩懂剧情说什么，当时也没有仔细探讨故事内容。后来在某网站上看到介绍突然心血来潮回来重新玩了一遍，因为是第二次玩，游戏过程简单了许多，有多余的时间细细品味整个剧情，我被这个游戏深深的震撼到了，玩到最后有种“啊！原来如此”的感觉，从前面莫名其妙的开场，到和女主邂逅的变化，所有的铺垫在最后一刻似乎都整个剧情推上了高潮，确实是连我这个会skin对话的人都忍不住感叹，这就是第九艺术的魅力啊。

最后，伊丽莎白真的是我见过最真实也最让人着迷的女主。我爱伊丽莎白！！

I finished BioShock 1 & 2 Remastered, but I got bored of this game at about the 4 hour mark, so everything I say is based on the early game experience. I liked the art and the new premise but the AI was the worst AI I think I've seen in a AAA game and the gun play was unsatisfying. But a lot of others like the game, so I would say it's worth a try if you can catch it on sale.

I thoroughly enjoyed the game. The idea of playing out the story from the beginning and hiding it from the player is pulled off phenomenally. Additionally, the game is very rewarding if you listen to all the recordings. 

The look of Columbia is done in such a way that it simply pleases the eye. The brilliantly stylized design and sounds create an incomparable experience. 

The supporting characters are interesting and very memorable. Elizabeth herself is probably the most useful NPC I've ever seen. And the coin trick is just a *chef kiss*

Of all the Bioshocks, even though the sheer use of weapons and Vigors has been trimmed it is the smoothest so far. It is a great pity that the system with the gun wheel from dlc was not included in the main game.

I also really enjoyed the Burial at Sea DLC even though the end took me by surprise once I figured out what was going to happen. And it was a bittersweet feeling that happens really rarely to me. The non-standard gameplay really appealed to me. The stealth + those goals animations, hacking and crossbow really suited the noir style of Elizabeth alone in Rapture. 

It was the most enjoyable of Bioshock for me and I would put it on par with the first
